title: Gozen 3-ji no Kikenchitai
original_name: 午前 3 時の危険地帯
sinopse:
Caught off guard, Tamako, who has no confidence, sex appeal, or romantic experiences, finds herself working for an office full of suspicious people that specializes in designing pachinko parlors. And thus, her days of agony begin to unfold.

(Source: Antebellum Scanlations)
